column1: join_quebec_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to Quebec
column3: make it likely that Quebec would be willing to negotiate our entrance into the confederation. Doing this means our country will be annexed by Quebec.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: lou_is_ours_desc;Our position on the North American continent means that Louisiana will block us from any expansion. They are a small country and so we will offer them statehood
form_nat_confederation_desc;This ousting of our brethren is the last straw. It is clear that if we want any semblance of peace we will need to unite with the other tribes.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_nat_confederation_desc;If we don't join the other tribes we will surely fall. We must join the confederation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column3: deserves better than European imperialists. We must free them!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_amazon_desc;The Amazon seems like a much more natural border. I'm sure Brazil wont mind us helping ourselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
